TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventEntry extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Acts as the property entry for event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The page parser uses property entry classes during parsing to represent expressions found within server control tags. The <xref:System.Web.UI.EventEntry> class is used for expressions that are bound to properties that specify an event handler. These bound properties start with "on", such as `OnClick` or `OnInit`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the method that handles the event.
Docs.value: A containing the event handler method name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In the property setting, the <xref:System.Web.UI.EventEntry.HandlerMethodName%2A> property is set to the value of the expression.
